resources.string: Quick Provisioning skips provisioning configuration and automatically uses default settings (primary network key, first available unicast address, no OOB).\n\nFor testing purposes only.

When enabled, the app automatically reprovisions and reconfigures devices if nodes with the same UUID already exist in the network.

The devices will be assigned a new unicast address. Any nodes configured to publish to the old unicast addresses will be reconfigured.

This is intended for recreating the network from a saved configuration.
